ComicInfo.Series: Wildstorm Fine Arts: The Gallery Collection
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wildstorm Fine Arts: The Gallery Collection is a gathering of covers, pin-ups, and posters from the talent that Wildstorm had to offer from 1992-1998.
All Wildstorm books are featured and spotlighted in this collection: The Authority, Backlash, Black Ops, Brass, Cybernary, Deathblow, DefCon 4, Desperadoes, Divine Right: The Adventures of Max Faraday, DV8, Gen 13, Grifter, The Kindred, Phantom Guard, Planetary, Siege, Sigma, Spartan, Storm Watch, Team 7, Union, Voodoo, WetWorks, WildC.A.T.S., WildCORE, and Zealot.
The Cliffhanger titles were also shown: Battle Chasers, Crimson, and Danger Girl.
Other titles included in the collection: America's Best Comics, Darkchylde, Guardian Angel, Kurt Busiek's Astro City, Leave It To Chance, Jim Lee's C-23, and The Wizard's Tale.
